item.name: NONE
item.comment: No mot commanding will be transmitted, frames are passed through to the output video port.

item.name: SIMPLE
item.comment: Look through a non-moving horizontal slit and stay away from edges via P-control.

item.name: SIMPLE_PID
item.comment: Draw the center line via a spline

item.name: COMPLEX_PID
item.comment: Draw out the racing line via a spline
